summary:
Assault rifles are powerful weapons used by many armies worldwide. The first one widely used was the German StG 44 in World War II. After the war, countries used battle rifles, but during the Vietnam War, the M16 rifle changed things. It led NATO countries to adopt assault rifles.

Two popular rifles are the AK-47 (firing 7.62mm rounds) and the M16 (5.56mm rounds). These rifles are known for their durability and are still used today, replacing older rifle designs in many armies.
title: Assault rifle
